name: Kixexa

specials.name: Burning Grasp
specials.description: When Kixexa grabs a creature, that creature takes 3d6 fire damage, and takes 3d6 fire damage at the end of each of its turns as long as it remains grabbed.

specials.name: Change Size
specials.description: Frequency Once per day. Effect Kixexa changes a creature’s size. This works as a 4th-level enlarge or shrink spell but can target an unwilling creature (DC 32 Fortitude save negates).

specials.name: Combat Grab
specials.description: Requirements Kixexa has one hand free. Effect Kixexa makes a melee Strike while keeping one hand free. If the Strike hits, the target is grabbed in Kixexa’s free hand.

specials.name: Overwhelming Energy
specials.description: Kixexa alters her spells to overcome resistances. If the next action she uses is to Cast a Spell, the spell ignores the target's resistance to acid, cold, electricity, fire, or sonic damage up to resistance 11. A creature’s immunities are unaffected.
